articles.title: Trump Tells Musk to “Head Back Home to South Africa” in Escalating Feud
articles.description: After Musk threatened to form a new political party, the president fired back with a nativist attack, accusing the billionaire of being a subsidy addict and threatening to have his own companies investigated.
articles.author: Luc Olinga

articles.title: Elon Musk Leaves Trump and MAGA with a Bang And a Smile
articles.description: The world's richest man blew up online MAGA with his new "America Party" and seemed to love every minute of the chaos.
articles.author: Luc Olinga

articles.title: Elon Musk Has a New Plan to Win Back MAGA
articles.description: After apologizing to Trump, the Tesla CEO returns to his favorite battleground: attacking liberals and “wokeism," as he tries to repair his image among conservative hardliners.
articles.author: Luc Olinga

articles.title: Trump Tries to Bury Epstein Scandal, but Elon Musk Won’t Let Him
articles.description: The world's richest man challenged the president's attempt to bury the Jeffrey Epstein scandal, framing the issue as a moral crisis that transcends politics.
articles.author: Luc Olinga

articles.title: As Sales Drop, Tesla Makes a Big Gamble on India
articles.description: With its sales cratering in the West, the electric vehicle giant is making a high-stakes pivot to the world's third-largest auto market.
articles.author: Luc Olinga

articles.title: Trump Was Just Asked If He’ll Deport Elon Musk
articles.description: After Musk attacked his signature spending bill, the U.S. president threatened to turn Musk's own government agency, DOGE, into a "monster" that would "go back and eat" him.
articles.author: Luc Olinga

articles.title: Elon Musk Is Back at Tesla, but the Magic Might Be Gone
articles.description: After a political detour that angered customers and tanked profits, the billionaire CEO returns to a Tesla in crisis.
articles.author: Luc Olinga

articles.title: Elon Musk Turns His AI Into a Flirty Anime Girlfriend
articles.description: From Hitler apologist to anime waifu: Musk's xAI debuts "Companions" in a whiplash-inducing pivot.
articles.author: Luc Olinga

articles.title: Elon Musk’s Trillion-Dollar Robotaxi Gamble Is Here
articles.description: After years of hype, Tesla’s self-driving taxi service is finally live.
articles.author: Luc Olinga

articles.title: Elon Musk Rekindles Trump Criticism, Attacks ‘Big, Beautiful Bill’
articles.description: He's mad about adding to the debt but seems fine with kicking people off of healthcare.
articles.author: AJ Dellinger
